## fmt-subs package

This library helps to handle "String Substitutions" that are used in a lot of libraries and even in the native `console.log` functionality.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Fmt](./fmt-subs.fmt.md) | Responsible for fmts creation, concatenation and assembling. |
|  [SubstitutionToken](./fmt-subs.substitutiontoken.md) | Token that are recognized by <code>fmt</code> internally during assembling |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [sub(something, substitution)](./fmt-subs.sub.md) | Constructs substitution |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [FmtFn](./fmt-subs.fmtfn.md) |  |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [fmt](./fmt-subs.fmt.md) | Tag function for template literals which wraps its contents into a [Fmt](./fmt-subs.fmt.md) instance. |
